程序包 org.giiwa.misc

类 GImage

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.giiwa.misc.GImage
  • 直接已知子类:
    X.Image

    public class GImage
extends java.lang.Object
    The Class GImage is image utility, convert image, create QRCode image

    • 方法详细资料

      • QRCode

        public static void QRCode​(java.io.File out,
                          java.lang.String text,
                          int width,
                          int height)
                   throws java.lang.Exception
        create QRCode image, and ouput to the file.
        参数:
        out - the output image file
        text - the content of the qrcode
        width - width of image
        height - height of image
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - the exception

      • scale

        public static void scale​(java.lang.String source,
                         int x,
                         int y,
                         int w0,
                         int h0,
                         java.lang.String file,
                         int pw,
                         int ph,
                         int w,
                         int h)
        已过时。 
        Scale the source image file to destination image file.
        参数:
        source - the source image file
        x - the x of source image
        y - the y of the source image
        w0 - the width of the source image
        h0 - the height of the source image
        file - the destination image file
        pw - the width of the destination image
        ph - the height of the destination image
        w - the width of the destination image
        h - the height of the destination image

      • scale

        public static void scale​(java.lang.String source,
                         int x,
                         int y,
                         int w0,
                         int h0,
                         int w1,
                         int h1,
                         java.lang.String file,
                         int w,
                         int h)
        已过时。 
        Scale the source image to destination image file.
        参数:
        source - the source image file
        x - the x of source image
        y - the y of source image
        w0 - the width of source image
        h0 - the height of source image
        w1 - the width of source image
        h1 - the height of source image
        file - the destination image file
        w - the width of destination image
        h - the height of destination image

      • scale2

        public static void scale2​(java.io.InputStream src,
                          java.io.OutputStream dest,
                          int w,
                          int h)
                   throws java.io.IOException
        以最大（高/宽）缩放， 不填充，输出w/h 不一定与参数一致
        参数:
        source - the source
        file - the file
        w - the w
        h - the h
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException

      • size

        public static java.awt.Point size​(java.io.InputStream in)
        get the size of image in inputstream.
        参数:
        in - the inputstream of image
        返回:
        Point of size

      • size

        public static java.awt.Point size​(java.net.URL url)
        get the size of image by url.
        参数:
        url - the url
        返回:
        Point of size

      • scale3

        public static void scale3​(java.io.InputStream src,
                          java.io.OutputStream dest,
                          int w,
                          int h)
                   throws java.io.IOException
        以最小（高/宽）缩放， 然后裁剪，输出w/h=输入参数
        参数:
        source - the source image
        file - the destination image file
        w - the width of the destination image
        h - the height of the destination image
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException

      • scale

        public static void scale​(java.io.InputStream src,
                         java.io.OutputStream dest,
                         int w,
                         int h)
                  throws java.io.IOException
        以最小（高/宽）， 缩放收裁剪， 输出w/h=输入参数
        参数:
        source - the InputStream
        file - the file object
        w - the width
        h - the height
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException

      • scale1

        public static void scale1​(java.io.InputStream src,
                          java.io.OutputStream dest,
                          int w,
                          int h)
                   throws java.io.IOException
        以最大（高/宽）缩放， 透明填充， 输出w/h=输入参数
        参数:
        source - the source image file
        file - the destination image file
        w - the width of destination image
        h - the height of destination image
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException

      • scale

        public static void scale​(java.lang.String url,
                         java.lang.String referer,
                         java.lang.String file,
                         int w,
                         int h)
        已过时。 
        Scale the source image in "url" with "referer" to destination image.
        参数:
        url - the source image url
        referer - the referer which maybe required when "get" the source image
        file - the destination image file
        w - the width of destination image
        h - the height of destination image

      • cover

        public static void cover​(java.lang.String dest,
                         int w,
                         int h,
                         java.util.List<java.lang.String> sources)
                  throws java.lang.Exception
        已过时。 
        make a Cover by source images.
        参数:
        dest - the destination cover image file
        w - the width of destination image
        h - the height of destination image
        sources - the source image files, should be 4, or 9
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - the exception

      • cover

        public static boolean cover​(java.lang.String dest,
                            int type,
                            int w,
                            int h,
                            java.util.List<java.lang.String> sources)
                     throws java.lang.Exception
        make a cover by source images.
        参数:
        dest - the destination of cover image
        type - the type of cover image
        w - the width of cover image
        h - the height of cover image
        sources - the source images files
        返回:
        true, if successful
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - the exception
